original_text: And he took the blind man by the hand, and led him out of the town; and when he had spit on his eyes, and put his hands upon him, he asked him if he saw ought.
korean_text: 예수께서 맹인의 손을 붙잡으시고 마을 밖으로 데리고 나가사 눈에 침을 뱉으시며 그에게 안수하시고 무엇이 보이느냐 물으시니

sentences.original_text: And he took the blind man by the hand
and led him out of the town
and when he had spit on his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그의 눈에 침을 뱉았을 때

sentences.original_text: and put his hands upon him
he asked him if he saw ought
